title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.38 - Vehicles-speed limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.38 - Vehicles-speed limits

State Regulations
(a) Vehicles at
a terminal shall be operated in strict compliance with speed limits prescribed
by the Port Authority as indicated by posted traffic signs. (b) No vehicle shall be driven on any mooring
facility at a greater speed than 12 miles per hour. (For speed limits at Port

Newark and Elizabeth-Port Authority marine terminal see pp. 1411-1412)
